ellipse.style: fill: rgba(216, 216, 216, 0); paint-order: fill; stroke: rgb(255, 99, 99); stroke-width: 40px;

line.style: fill: rgb(216, 216, 216); stroke: rgb(255, 99, 99); stroke-linecap: round; stroke-width: 40px;
fill: rgb(216, 216, 216); stroke: rgb(255, 99, 99); stroke-linecap: round; stroke-width: 40px; transform-box: fill-box; transform-origin: 50% 50%;
